text:
Video loading 
Unless you're a complete maverick - and don't mind risking the damage when you drop your smartphone - you will have invested in a case for your precious device. 
But what happens when your case breaks or goes missing? Or maybe you just don't want to splash out on a new one right now. 
Well fear not, because this video has the answer to your problems. 
Simple: All you need is a balloon 
And amazingly, all you need is a balloon. 
First step is simple enough - inflate the balloon. (It might be easier if you have a friend to help by holding the end). 
Next step: Slowly deflate the balloon... 
Then, place your phone on top of the balloon and let it slowly deflate. 
The balloon then shrinks around your device, providing the perfect makeshift case. 
Et voila! Your very own (makeshift) iPhone case 
We say 'makeshift' because it means you can't really use the headphone socket, charging port or the camera but hey - it's a great quick fix! 
The mind-blowing clip has been uploaded to YouTube where it has been viewed more than 2.2 million times . Poll loading â€¦
